title: kentrolla
author: kentrolla
content: Many said its absolutely a scam, pathetic and more. but crypto currency has favored to those who trusted on it, In terms of cross border payment, p2p and vice versa the domination of crypto is keep on increasing. In terms of investment people knew only Crude, stocks, bonds, stock market, gold etc...but this platform made a way ahead to make money harder and smarter, I know most of the government's are not favoring this but in upcoming years you will see the green signal for crypto as well.  I personally feel it has changed most of us in our life, In terms of technology and development we every one know the way we are heading towards web3, metaverse, defi are remarkable. All credits to development of bitcoin  I am earning this from as well, I never thought I would make much descent money in this sector. share your success as well thankyou

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Success in cryptocurrency is adoption by institutions and by majority of people. But ofcourse we're still far from this possibility. So if we would base at the present, I think we are in good progress given that more people and countries are considering this technology's usage. With regards to my success in this industry, I'd say I'm still far from that feeling of satisfaction. For me, being successful to anything is the same as meeting a point wherein you will be satisfied but not contented ofcourse. And if it is individual's success in this industry, then it would also be tied with profit. And with regards to profit, many for sure have suffered from loss due to unpredictable price movements and wrong decisions but be sure to learn atleast and to look forward with what's next for cryptocurrencies.

comments.author: kamvreto
comments.body: Everyone's success will certainly be different and what you are getting now is thanks to the hard work you are doing. Crypto has also made me a lot of money so far. There are many projects that I work on and continue to be involved with new projects. Getting an Airdrop from every new project gives a lot of advantages, I got it several times and almost never missed one. The important thing is to be consistent and keep abreast of new projects. Because of the many profits that I managed to get I started doing some trading and investing in the recommended projects. Many success stories of people in crypto and many more who earn thousands to millions of dollars in crypto. Who wants to try and stay consistent he will get the result.

comments.author: trendcoin
comments.body: I know this topic is one that questions financial success, but I still want to go a little outside of the box... Cryptocurrencies and Bitcoin in particular have changed many things in my life. My perspective on the world has changed. My perspective on money and its history has changed. Cryptocurrencies have changed and improved me for the better. Of course, I made money from cryptocurrencies, but first of all, I think I gained an identity because the world is no longer the old world for me... I am eternally grateful to God for meeting Satoshi and his idea of Bitcoin.

All credits to development of bitcoin  I am earning this from as well, I never thought I would make much descent money in this sector. share your success as well thankyou The term success is very subjective and depends on an individual. For me, the success is measured by ROI. I have a decent amount of investment into cryptos and I also hold millions of dead tokens from various old ICOs. So for me, it's return on investment. The technology is fine, but there are many tokens available in the market today which are technically superior than bitcoin. But Bitcoin is still ruling the crypto market. So I assume a lot of people don't give a shit about tech, rather they care more about returns.

comments.author: ahoenk
comments.body: I measure my auccess in crypto currency when i can hold some coin which give me good performance, or if i invest in many project, at least i can get 100x of the price for 30% of the project i invested

All credits to development of bitcoin  I am earning this from as well, I never thought I would make much descent money in this sector. share your success as well thankyou I think that I have been lucky so far in 2021 when I made a ton of profit from the Bitcoin I was holding and sold a big chunk of it at 59.500 dollars.I invested about 14.500 in a big mining rig at that time for 300 Mhsh which is stuck with me now,only 100 Mhsh I have active.What I define as not success though is the fact that I have not been able to be as good as a holder I was back then as I have been losing a lot of crypto in the casino and that is what I want to correct until the next bull run.I want to emulate the 2021 success in 2025 yet so far I am far from it and my objective is to come as near as possible  .

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: Cryptocurrency has changed my life positively , there are things I have now that I won't have achieved if not for Crypto, since I joined the space I have been independent financially, married and  have beautiful children, though there are some setbacks like hacks and the Luna fiasco but it has been one of the best thing to happen to me in the last 7 years and I am very grateful to God for this.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Quote from: kentrolla on July 10, 2023, 02:47:01 PM~It's not that big I guess, but it can definitely be called a success. I mean I had nothing when I joined, now at least I have a bit that I can confidently call my own. In terms of development, it hasn't really helped much, but in financial making decisions and related stuff? Vastly helped me to learn a lot. Just the fact that it made me aware of investing and what to take note of is a big thing already imo. It's also personally teached me about losses, hard ones, which I wasn't really familiar with (but I was kind of aware of) back then when I was still in college.

comments.author: Psynthax
comments.body: honestly I'd consider success in cryptocurrency just the same as investing in some other investments.it's basically a success if you could grow your initial investments or you have an income from it. moreover considering the fact that many cryptocurrency holders has been having some massive profits if they hold it for long.i think pretty much all those holders are successful people.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: Psynthax on July 10, 2023, 10:45:03 PMhonestly I'd consider success in cryptocurrency just the same as investing in some other investments.it's basically a success if you could grow your initial investments or you have an income from it. moreover considering the fact that many cryptocurrency holders has been having some massive profits if they hold it for long.i think pretty much all those holders are successful people.We could see see this from two different points of views, from the point of view of the market and from our point of view, when it comes to this market in general I think there is no other way to describe what we are seeing as nothing else but an absolute success, this market went from zero to a 1.23 trillion dollars in a little bit more than a decade, so the story of this market is the story of a huge success, and in my particular case I think I have done well enough as well, as you may guess I could have done better, but what person does not think they could have obtained even better results if they took slightly different decisions?

comments.author: mu_enrico
comments.body: If the question is about my personal success, then it must be based on my net worth, whether or not cryptocurrency has helped me increase my net worth. And the answer is yes, but the benefit mostly came from the campaign. I have yet to see significant benefits from my real-world work, such as increasing business revenue and stuff due to the usage of cryptocurrency. It's not yet a success in my opinion if I use this as a base of the valuation, maybe because crypto is not yet mainstream, but maybe it's because my business isn't suitable for the crypto ecosystem, hard to tell... Currently, all my revenue is from fiat transactions.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: QuoteRe: How would you measure your success in Crypto currencyThe word success is very broad, and it also depends on the person.It's a very subjective thing, and different people have different reasons for them to be called successful.Some can just have 100 Bitcoins, and call themselves successful already. Some can just have reach their dream goal of having a hundred million dollars, and call themselves successful already. Some can call themselves successful if they manage to give their family a house and lot plus a car. In cryptocurrency, TBH I can't measure my success into it because I'm very far away still from reaching my goal. What is my goal? Just simple. Holding a single Bitcoin in my wallet. I know it's hard (at least for me), but I believe that I can reach that one in the near future. Right now, I guess my measure of success is at around 20% only. I'm still far away from my goal like I said.

comments.body: when viewed from the beginning I knew cryptocurrencies, even though there were not many results compared to those who already knew them beforehand, but I am grateful because with cryptocurrencies I can realize my dreams which seemed impossible to come true. of course, a large income from following crypto until I finally survived to this day. my hope is that during a bearish market like this I invest as much as possible according to my ability to finally get results in the next bullish season, and it will continue to circulate like that, as additional income, unfortunately I have not been able to maximize the income from the trading sector to meet my daily needs

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: The answer from your question gonna be different caused by it must be based on the personal's perspective. In my understand if someone can be called success in crypto when he will able to make bunch of money from crypto. I have used money as a way to determine how success someone is in the crypto currency. It's caused by crypto is about speculative asset and money. I don't wanna put tech as measurement caused by it's not all of people actively using tech available in crypto. I do believe if mostly people is willing to earn money from using crypto. that's why i called crypto as a tool to generate money online. No reason for me to call someone who adopted crypto's tech as a successful crypto user. I prefer to take how much money that can be generated by anyone rather than tech in crypto. Im not so naive by saying tech is a measurement in the crypto while money is everything in crypto now.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Still, despite the success of bitcoin and some other projects, the rest of the crypto industry is an absolute scam to this day. The possibility of making money on scam does not mean that this project is reliable. It means that you are among the lucky ones who managed to cash out their profits in time, while the rest lose money on crypto investments. The crypto industry is not yet sufficiently developed in terms of regulation and regulations regarding the various mechanisms for buying and selling cryptocurrencies. Scammers take advantage of this uncertainty and therefore create many dubious schemes.
